Package com.github.yeetmanlord.bedwars_zeta.api.api_event_hooks.game

package com.github.yeetmanlord.bedwars_zeta.api.api_event_hooks.game
Contains all custom events that relate to in-game happenings from player kills to bed breaks
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    com.github.yeetmanlord.bedwars_zeta.api.api_event_hooks
    This package contains all custom events to help micro-manage and tailor a custom bedwars experience
    com.github.yeetmanlord.bedwars_zeta.api.api_event_hooks.game.global
     
    com.github.yeetmanlord.bedwars_zeta.api.api_event_hooks.data
    Contains all custom events that relate to data management.
    com.github.yeetmanlord.bedwars_zeta.api.api_event_hooks.scoreboard
    Contains all custom events that relate to scoreboards.
    com.github.yeetmanlord.bedwars_zeta.api.api_event_hooks.stats
    This package contains the event classes that are used to hook into the Bedwars-Zeta API related to stats.
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    FinalKillEvent
    Use this event to process code every time a player is final killed
    This could be used to add particle effects or custom functionality (like adding to stats) to final kills
    GameEvent
     
    GameEventFireEvent
    Use this event to process code every time a certain GameEvent is fired
    This is used for adding extra functionality to existing game events or completely overriding existing functionality by using GameEventFireEvent.setOverride(boolean)
    Canceling this event prevents it from firing.
    GameFinishEvent
    Called once the game finishes (This is not when a team wins.
    PlayerKilledEvent
    Use this event to process code every time a player is killed
    This could be used to add particle effects or custom functionality (like adding to stats) to kills
    PreTeamSelectionEvent
    Fires before teams are selected.
    QueueUpdateEvent
    Use this event to process code every queue update (1 second)
    If this event is cancelled the queue will stop and the game will never start.
    TeamBedBreakEvent
    Use this event to process code every time a team's bed is broken
    This could be used to add particle effects or custom functionality (like adding to stats) to bed breaking
    TeamWinEvent
    Called when a team wins the game.
    TrapTriggerEvent
    Use this event to process code every time a trap is triggered
    This is used to modify the duration of the effects as well as the amplifier.
